name: Jock and the Time Rings
overview: The only way in which JOCK can return to his time - 2112 AD -, is to collect 32 rings of time of each of the three time zones. However these are protected by the guardian of The rings in many ways and ways. To make things even worse, the rings of time they become unstable in the presence of Jock. If it takes too long to catch a ring, the radiation will It becomes deadly. The indiscriminate use of Jock's speed booster will increase the impoverishment of his power supply Decreasing potency means that your life is in danger. But Power supply is regenerated at the beginning of each zone. The points are calculated for each ring that is collected (depending on the color of the ring) and also for the remaining power At the end of each zone. An extra life is given for every five rings collected, the number being maximum of lives 9. At the beginning of the game a code word is requested. By typing the correct code, the Immediate access to the next area. These codes are given when the previous zone is complete.
